definition: to issue/to distribute/to publish along with
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Some medical schools issue students with smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 一些醫科學校也會給學生配發智能手機。

sentences.english: Early last year, the higher authority issued a mobile petrol car to them.
sentences.chinese: 去年年初，上級爲連隊配發了一臺車載式移動值勤車。

definition: to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
to have exclusive selling rights/to be the sole agent for a production unit or firm

pinyin: shou3 ci4 gong1 kai1 zhao1 gu3

definition: to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
